mapper.sql: id, action_person, consumer_name, consumer_phone, car_brand, car_model, mortgage_commissioner, mortgage_company, loan_fee, interest_rate, mortgage_rebate, back_fee, pay_back_fee, assessment_fee, renewal_fee, sign_bill_fee, over_year_fee, risk_fee, pad_fee, door_fee, stamp_duty, other_fee, expense_company, business_expense_fee, force_expense_fee, business_expense_rebate, business_expense_back, mortgage_date, mortgage_money, gross_profit, need_pay_consumer, agent_pay_fee, mortgage_type, display_status, ctime, utime
mapper.select: select auto_increment from information_schema.TABLES where TABLE_SCHEMA='cm' and TABLE_NAME='cm_mortgage_log'
mapper.insert: insert into cm_mortgage_log (action_person, consumer_name, consumer_phone, car_brand, car_model, mortgage_commissioner, mortgage_company, loan_fee, interest_rate, mortgage_rebate, back_fee, pay_back_fee, assessment_fee, renewal_fee, sign_bill_fee, over_year_fee, risk_fee, pad_fee, door_fee, stamp_duty, other_fee, expense_company, business_expense_fee, force_expense_fee, business_expense_rebate, business_expense_back, mortgage_date, mortgage_money, gross_profit, need_pay_consumer, agent_pay_fee, mortgage_type, display_status, ctime, utime) values (#{actionPerson},#{consumerName},#{consumerPhone},#{carBrand},#{carModel},#{mortgageCommissioner},#{mortgageCompany},#{loanFee},#{interestRate}, #{mortgageRebate},#{backFee},#{payBackFee},#{assessmentFee},#{renewalFee},#{signBillFee},#{overYearFee},#{riskFee},#{padFee},#{doorFee},#{stampDuty},#{otherFee}, #{expenseCompany},#{businessExpenseFee},#{forceExpenseFee},#{businessExpenseRebate},#{businessExpenseBack},#{mortgageDate},#{mortgageMoney}, #{grossProfit},#{needPayConsumer},#{agentPayFee},#{mortgageType},#{displayStatus},#{ctime},#{utime})
mapper.update:
update cm_mortgage_log
action_person = #{actionPerson},
consumer_name = #{consumerName},
consumer_phone = #{consumerPhone},
car_brand = #{carBrand},
car_model = #{carModel},
mortgage_commissioner = #{mortgageCommissioner},
mortgage_company = #{mortgageCompany},
loan_fee = #{loanFee},
interest_rate = #{interestRate},
mortgage_rebate = #{mortgageRebate},
back_fee = #{backFee},
pay_back_fee = #{payBackFee},
assessment_fee = #{assessmentFee},
renewal_fee = #{renewalFee},
sign_bill_fee = #{signBillFee},
over_year_fee = #{overYearFee},
risk_fee = #{riskFee},
pad_fee = #{padFee},
door_fee = #{doorFee},
stamp_duty = #{stampDuty},
other_fee = #{otherFee},
expense_company = #{expenseCompany},
business_expense_fee = #{businessExpenseFee},
force_expense_fee = #{forceExpenseFee},
business_expense_rebate = #{businessExpenseRebate},
business_expense_back = #{businessExpenseBack},
mortgage_date = #{mortgageDate},
mortgage_money = #{mortgageMoney},
gross_profit = #{grossProfit},
need_pay_consumer = #{needPayConsumer},
agent_pay_fee = #{agentPayFee},
display_status = #{displayStatus},
utime = #{utime},
where id = #{id}
